data.title: How to design your living room just like Mel's
data.meta_description: I wanted to share all the best pieces I've filled my home with, while trying to be cost-effective but luxurious!
data.text:
Vicks

VH845 Warm Mist Humidifier

£58.00

The Warm Mist humidifier releases up to 99% bacteria-free mist into the air to help easy breathing and for a more comfortable sleep. You can choose between 2 mist output levels (High or Low), depending on the amount of moisture you want to add into the room. The unit will shut off automatically when the tank is empty. Recommended for rooms up to 37m2. Use with VapoPads for added soothing vapours.

COSRX

Refresh AHA BHA Vitamin C Lip Plumper 20g

£22

We always say that K-Beauty is well ahead of the western skincare market and this is true for Cosrx’. Cosrx have thought about everything with this lip treatment when it comes to skincare loving ingredients. The combination of AHAs and BHAs make it suitable for those that struggle with blackheads along the lip line and breakouts that occur near the lip. With the addition of vitamin C, you are also getting some amount of antioxidant protection which helps to protect the skin from free radical damage that contributes towards premature lip ageing.

Typology

Resurfacing Lip Peel

£22.90

This product just cannot be kept in stock, it is so popular! Do not be intimidated by the word peel at all, this is a very gently formulated product that will not cause any lip irritation. Due to the design of this product, you can apply it at night similarly to a gloss, or lip balm. Using the key ingredients mandelic acid and pomegranate enzyme to break down any flakes and smooth any light cracks that may appear on the lip. Additionally, mandelic acid is an AHA which also helps to hydrate and plump the skin. A favourite amongst many skincare aficionados, as this formula borrows key ingredients from facial skincare. You may actually notice the entire layer of your skin peeling off at once!

Muji

Travel Sewing Kit

£3.95

Sewing on the go!

As someone who is quite clumsy, I have definitely split a seam or two in my lifetime and had to do an emergency project runway situation in the bathroom or car. This Muji sewing kit is one of my favourites as the cutting tool actually cut things rather than the useless pairs of scissors that have been placed in other travel sewing kits.

Wet Ones

Sustainable Antibacterial Wipes

£12.00

Antibacterial heaven!

Since seeing Naomi Campbell cleansing her entire space during a flight made me very aware of how dirty some surfaces can be. Since then I have sworn that I will never leave the house without a pack of antibacterial wipes. You can pick some up at the local grocery store or from amazon.

Tide

Instant Stain Remover Pen

£7.45

Stains on the go

If you’re living life properly, you may get a stain on your clothes every now and then. A tip I picked up from Melissa herself was to carry a few tide pens in my handbag! I learnt the hard way that wiping things with a damp cloth does not always produce the results I need, but the tide pen can refresh your outfit, like the stain never happened.

Procter & Gamble Tide to go Instant Stain Remover Pen

Neutrogena

Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelette Singles

£12.99

Makeup wipes!

You may be running around somewhere and you need to remove your makeup and start again or you may wish to simply remove your lip combo. These neutrogena wipes are individually wrapped which means you can keep keep a few in your purse without having to carry an entire back of wipes.

SpaceNK

Medium Travel Bag

£26.00

Getting organised

Growing up made me realise that most handbags do not have enough compartments or pockets. Which means that you need to make them yourself. SpaceNK have the cutest set of clear travel bags and I have found that the medium and smallest size are ideal for keeping inside your handbag. You can use these pouches to store makeup, sanitary products and the rest of the items on this list.

This Hair Of Fine

Scalp Serum

£46.00

The most important thing to remember about washing your braids is that you cannot airdry them. The hair needs to be thoroughly dried using either an overhead dryer or a hair dryer. The Dyson hair dryer’s diffuser attachment is great for doing this, as it evenly distributes the heat from the dryer and feels very comfortable to hold.

Goldwell

DualSenses Scalp Specialist Sensitive Foam Shampoo

£7.45

After rinsing everything out of your hair it is important to rehydrate the scalp and soothe it after all of the physical exfoliation. If you are not wanting to splurge on extra products you can apply the same hydrating serum that you use on your face to your scalp.

One of my favourite do-it-all serums of all time would be This Hair of Mine Scalp Serum, which hydrates and moisturises the scalp all at once.

Prequel.

Skin Utility Ointment Multi-purpose Skin Protectant

£18.00

This is not a suggestion that most people would think of, but when you urgently need to calm your skin down from an eczema flare up, you will try anything. As mentioned above, there is an inflammatory component to eczema, which requires soothing. For those instant soothing results, some people turn to using LED therapy, particularly the waves RED and NIR (Near Infrared). Some aesthetic clinics can offer this treatment to you, but this is also something that can be done at home using an LED mask or wand.

It is all well and good following all of the tips above, but if you do not take sunscreen seriously you will not be able to benefit and see the true treatment results.

SVR

XERIAL 10 Rich Body Lotion for Flaky Skin 400ml

£21.00

Sadly you cannot escape needing some form of ointment on your skin when dealing with eczema, but fear not! Ointments have had an upgrade to make them a lot slicker and less greasy. The reason skin professionals advise the use of an ointment is to help create a protective barrier between your skin and the external environment. A favourite amongst aestheticians at the moment is the Prequel Skin ointment, that combines bisabolol, ceramides, oat bran extract and petrolatum to condition cracked and sensitive skin.

H&M

Hooded fleece all-in-one suit

£14.40

All-in-one suit in soft fleece that can be worn as it is or as a warming mid layer. Jersey-lined hood with ear appliqués and a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has an anti-chafe chin guard. Extra-long, ribbed trims at the cuffs and hems that can be folded down as your child grows.

CurrentBody

Skin LED Neck and Dec Perfector

£269.00

If you’re serious about taking your neck care game to the next level, this expert-approved device from Current Body has everything you need to achieve the smooth and youthful looking neck you’ve always wanted. The No.1 anti-ageing LED device has clinically proven red and near-infrared wavelengths that reduce wrinkles by 35% in just 4 weeks and 95% of users said their skin tone, texture and firmness improved after use. It has been made with patented flexible silicone which moulds to the body, ensuring maximum light penetration.

Neostrata

Skin Active – Triple Firming Neck Cream

£50.00

Suitable for normal, dry and oily skin types, this anti-aging neck cream from Neostrata has been formulated with a complex trio of ingredients that all work together to deliver a lifted and firmer appearance. One of the ingredients is NeoGlucosamine, a Neostrata patented non-acid amino sugar that reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and alleviates discoloration for a more even skin tone. It also gently exfoliates the skin to reveal fresh new cells, so it’s perfect for those who are struggling with discoloration in the neck area and don’t want to use actives.

Dr. Brandt

Needles No More Neck Tightening Cream

£76.00

This rich firming cream from Dr. Brandt has been formulated to lift and tighten the look of delicate neck skin, smoothing lines and improving sagging under the chin. It’s 95% natural and contains peptides that work to tighten and lift the look of sagging neck skin while restoring elasticity and tone, strengthening the neck skin for a more pronounced lifting effect. It’s also cruelty free and non-comedogenic, so if you have oily/combination skin and are worried about breaking out in the neck area, this cream might be suitable for you.

Necessaire

The Neck Serum

£60.00

This neck serum from Necessaire was one of the first to emerge in the neck care space and it’s been highly rated by beauty editors. The daily multi-peptide treatment for tech neck and aged neck is a fast-absorbing emulsion that triggers the skin’s own ability to create collagen and support its repair cycle, leaving it feeling firm and looking lifted. Not only is the formula vegan, it also reduces the appearance of lines and discoloration and contains a formula of skin loving ingredients such as rosewater, niacinamide and squalene. A bonus is that it’s suitable for everyday use.

Gatineau

Defi Lift Firming Neck & Décolleté Gel

£54.00

This gel has been formulated with a rejuvenating formula that visibly firms and tightens the skin on the neck, leaving it instantly smooth and tightened.

All Defi Lift products have been designed to tone and redefine slackened skin. It also contains a variety of skin loving ingredients such as vitamin E and sea moss extract. According to the brand, 86% of consumers said the product left their neck area feeling rejuvenated and 92% said the product left their skin looking smoother.

Meder

Arma-Neck Cream

£90.00

This award-winning neck cream from Mede has been formulated to address age-related changes that can appear on the skin of your neck such as dryness and thinnes. It restores and strengthens the structure of the neck skin while preventing the formation of circular wrinkles and skin sagging. The silky cream contains organic sweet almond oil and collagen and elastin boosting peptide. According to the brand, regular use helps prevent loss of elasticity and improves the appearance of neck skin in just a few weeks.

Yves Saint Laurent

Libre Eau de Parfum

£92.00

Libre (the French word for ‘free’) pays tribute to YSL’s most defining and enduring value: freedom. Described by the brand as a grand floral EDP with an unequivocal twist, it contains notes of orange blossom flowers from Morocco that have been combined with aromatic lavender from France. The bottle is beautiful – there’s an elegance about it that would make it a welcome addition on anyone’s dressing table.

Byredo

Slow Dance

£140.00

The inspiration behind this bestseller was the rites-of-passage moment that’s experienced by girls and boys before they become women and men. Rich and intoxicating, it contains a variety of sweet, fresh and woody scents such as vanilla, violet and patchouli. Judging by online reviews, this vegan fragrance would be suitable for those who want to invite a bit of nostalgia into their lives.

Maison Francis Kurkdijan

724 Eau de Parfum

£195.00

Maison Francis Kurkdijan is renowned for their sophisticated and timeless scents and 724 is no exception. It’s inspired by cities across the globe and blends Italian bergamot with white flower accord over the top of sensual musk to create an aromatic floral scent. The scent is reminiscent of the feeling of watching the sun rise over the top of high-rise urban buildings, hence the architectural-inspired glass bottle.

Sana Jardin

Tiger By Her Side

£180.00

A personal favourite of mine, I discovered this fragrance online and immediately wanted to know more about the brand and the rest of their offering. This scent is everything you’d want from a perfume you can wear all year round – subtle, yet uplifting. If you like sweet perfumes that aren’t overpowering, then this one might be suitable for you.

Burberry

Goddess

£95.00

This soft and sensual perfume is the latest scent from the brand. Described as a ‘celebration of self-discovery, all of its notes contain vanilla, which is accompanied by woody aromas and lavender. Vanilla is believed to have a calming effect on the mind, so if this is something you look for in a fragrance, then it might be suitable for you. A bonus is that it comes in a refillable bottle, so you can save money and reduce your environmental impact.

Ørskov

Magazine box

£109

Keep track of your favorite magazines with this box from Ørskov designed by Jørgen Møller. The box is made of high quality leather with solid stitches and is equipped with a practical handle which makes it easy to move around. Place the box in the living room or bedroom and match it with other exquisite interior products from Ørskov! Available in different colors.

Youth To The People

Superclay Purify +Clear Power Mask

£33.00

Clay masks can be incredibly annoying and sometimes not worth the messy application, but Youth To The People really created a gem with the Superclay Purify + Clear Power Mask which contains an expert blend of salicylic acid, kaolin and kombucha to smooth and unclog pores. If you ever need to reduce your skin texture overnight or you have a big event coming up, use some of the Superclay mask to treat your problem areas. Kaolin in particular is ideal for mopping up excess oil, whilst salicylic acid helps to break down oil within the pores and also resurface the skin.

Youth To The People

Polypeptide-121 Future Cream

£58.00

Moisturisers can really make or break your skincare routine, finding one that is not a sensory nightmare but also provides a whole day of hydration, can be incredibly tricky. A fairly recent launch from Youth To The People can is the Polypeptide-121 Future Cream which contains a vegan polypeptide, ceramides and pea plant proteins to nourish and support the skin barrier. A perfect choice for all skin types!

Youth To The People

Retinal + Niacinamide Youth Serum

£64.00

Retinal has been a trending ingredient throughout the year as it works much faster than retinol to boost cellular turnover, improve skin texture, reduce breakouts and reduce hyperpigmentation. Youth To The People were one of the first major brands to launch a retinal serum, which is blended with niacinamide, ceramides, hyaluronic acid and arginine. If you are wanting to give your skin a complete overhaul, this is the serum for you.

Youth To The People

Superfood Cleanser

£38.00

The Superfood Cleanser is a cult classic that is loved by everyone, including Melissa herself! Containing spinach, green tea and kale in a gel formula to soothe and cleanse the skin. This cleanser is ideal for most skin types, but is a favourite amongst those with combination skin. If you are dealing with redness all three key ingredients help to reduce redness and calm irritated skin.

Pattern

Pattern Hydrating Mist 88.7ml

£7.00

From the mind of Tracee Ellis Ross comes a line specifically tailored to kinky, curly, coily and textured tresses – proving that sometimes it takes a legend to create legendary hair care.

Not everyday can be wash day (read: when our curls look their best) but the Hydrating Mist is the next best thing as it breathes life back into curls so they look just as gorgeous in-between washes.

MÉTIER

Leather Backgammon Set

£750.00

There are so many things to appreciate about Métier’s leather backgammon set, from its hand-painted edges and beautifully shaped inlays to its conveniently compact size. Ideal for travelling, it has hand-stitched dice shakers that are fitted with discreet magnets, acting as an anchor to secure the rolled board, while every piece zips away safely into a special compartment. Pack it for your next long train journey or for whiling away the hours on a layover.

Sophie Kinsella

Christmas Shopaholic

£2.14

In Sophie Kinsella’s “Christmas Shopaholic,” the beloved character Becky Brandon (née Bloomwood) returns for another delightful adventure. Set during the festive season, Becky is determined to host the perfect Christmas for her family. However, her plans take a comedic turn when unexpected guests, eccentric relatives, and a mishap with a holiday display complicate her preparations. As Becky navigates the chaos, she also faces the challenge of finding the ideal gift for her husband, Luke. Filled with humour, holiday cheer, and the signature shopaholic escapades, this novel is a charming addition to the Shopaholic series, offering readers a festive and entertaining story.

Don Miguel Ruiz

The Four Agreements

£5.66

“The Four Agreements” by Don Miguel Ruiz is a spiritual guide that draws on ancient Toltec wisdom to provide a code of conduct for personal freedom and fulfilment. The book outlines four transformative agreements that, when adopted, can lead to a more authentic and empowered life. Ruiz’s teachings encourage readers to break free from self-limiting beliefs and societal conditioning, fostering a path toward personal freedom and a more fulfilling life. “The Four Agreements” has gained widespread popularity for its simple yet profound wisdom and its potential to bring about positive transformation in individuals’ lives.

Jasmine Guillory

Royal Holiday

£9.00

“Royal Holiday” by Jasmine Guillory is a heart-warming romantic novel that follows the story of Vivian Forest, who accompanies her daughter Maddie, a stylist, on a work trip to England. Maddie has been enlisted to style a member of the royal family, and Vivian finds herself unexpectedly drawn into a romantic adventure of her own. While in England, Vivian develops a connection with Malcolm, the private secretary to the Queen. The two navigate the challenges of a long-distance relationship and the intricacies of royal life, discovering love in the most unexpected places. Guillory’s “Royal Holiday” is a charming and delightful tale of love, self-discovery, and the magic of unexpected connections in a royal setting.

Rings any bells?

Eckhart Tolle

The Power of Now

£16.95

“The Power of Now” by Eckhart Tolle is a spiritual guide that emphasizes the importance of living in the present moment. Tolle explores the concept of mindfulness, urging readers to release themselves from the shackles of past regrets and future anxieties. He argues that true happiness and enlightenment can be found by fully embracing the present and detaching from the constant mental chatter that dominates our thoughts. Tolle’s teachings draw from various spiritual traditions and provide practical advice on how to achieve a state of presence and awareness. “The Power of Now” has become a widely acclaimed and influential work, guiding readers toward a more fulfilling and enlightened existence.

Maya Angelou

Amazing Peace

£16.00

“Amazing Peace: A Christmas Poem” by Maya Angelou is a reflective and hopeful poem that explores the theme of peace during the Christmas season. Angelou envisions a world where people of all backgrounds and cultures come together in a spirit of harmony and unity. The poem speaks to the universal longing for peace and celebrates the idea that, despite differences, humanity can find common ground. Angelou’s eloquent verses convey a message of hope, emphasizing the transformative power of peace in creating a better world. Through vivid imagery and poignant language, “Amazing Peace” encourages readers to embrace the possibility of a more harmonious and compassionate existence.

MAC

Lip Scrubtious

£17.60

Another slightly spenny option from me but it really is a lifestyle hun! We have two options here either a very sweet option or a classic vanilla if you have less of a sweet tooth. The main thing that I love about this scrub is the vitamin e and the texture of the scrub.

Fresh

Sugar Lip Polish Exfoliator

£17.00

A decadent choice and all time favourite of mine would have to be the Fresh Beauty Lip Polish Exfoliator. This is definitely a spenny choice, but it reminds me of a warm mocha and baking with brown sugar. Aside from the scent and flavour, this formula contains jojoba oil which is an oil that is incredibly nourishing and similar to the skin’s natural oils. As this formula is slightly wetter than most sugar scrubs, you will not have to worry about a crumbly application or mess.

Refy Beauty

Lip Buff

£14.00

Like I said not all lip scrubs are created equal, some people cannot stand the sensation of sugar crystals rolling over their lips or they find the application process a tad bit messy. Well today is your lucky day! Refy Beauty recently launched their new lip buff which contains no physical scrubbing particles, but instead has a unique exfoliating applicator. The formula itself offers a blend of hydrating ingredients that can slightly plump the lips and nourish any lip dryness.

Bubble Gum

Lip Scrub

£7.00

A nostalgic favourite of mine, would have to be the lush bubblegum flavoured (yes flavoured) lip scrub. As someone who has a sweet tooth, I simply could not resist. This is a fun lip scrub that will brighten up your day with its pink hue and delicious taste. If you happen to be kissing anyone later, it would not hurt to taste like bubblegum.

SVR

Sebiaclear Ampoule AZ Flash

£33.00

French skincare brands are having a moment and rightly so. One of my personal favourites is SVR. The Sebiaclear Ampoule AZ Flash contains 15% azelaic acid and 2% niacinamide (while both ingredients are retinol alternatives, they can be used together). It also contains salicylic acid and zinc. All ingredients help to diminish the appearance of excess oils and sebum while protecting the skin against breakout-causing bacteria. If you have sensitive, blemish-prone skin, this might be suitable for you.

Intuisse

Active NAD+ Essential Cream

£145.00

Most retinol alternatives can be used during the day – just remember to wear sunscreen! If you’re into skincare, then you’ll know that there are some new, ground-breaking ingredients that are revolutionising the beauty space, one product at a time. One of them is Active NAD+, which is a naturally occurring co-enzyme that is found in all human cells. Active NAD+’s levels decline as we age and science-led skincare brand

Intuisse are addressing this with their product range which includes this intensely moisturising cream. It’s packed with antioxidants to protect the skin against pollution and inflammation, improving hydration and radiance in the process and revealing brighter and healthier looking skin.

REN

Bio Retinoid™ Youth Cream

£54.00

If you’re looking for a range of alternative retinol products, then you might want to consider giving REN’s new BioRetinoid range a try. It includes a youth serum, youth oil and youth cream. The cream is powered by a plant-based alternative called Bidens Pilosa and is proven to deliver visibly firmer, more supple and healthier-looking skin after 28 days while limiting irritation, making it suitable for those with sensitive skin.

Sanex

Expert Skin Health + Atopicare Oil Repair Shower Gel 515ml

£4.49

If you were lucky enough to grow up with sensitive or dry skin then you will be familiar with the household favourite brand Sanex. Sanex have developed their own skin barrier repairing ‘Expert Skin Health +Atopicare Oil Repair Shower Gel’ at a ridiculously affordable price which contains inulin, lactic acid and glycerin to repair a damaged skin barrier. Lactic acid is a particularly great ingredient for dealing with dry skin as it deeply nourishes and provides a smoothing property.

La Roche-Posay

Lipikar Syndet AP+ Body Wash 400ml

£

One of my favourite parts of traveling is stumbling upon skincare gems that I fall in love with and introduce into my routine when I get home. This was the case for the La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet AP+ Body Wash, which saved me during a dry skin spiral during my trip to Europe. I remember choosing this body cleanser as it is has more of a creamy texture and contains glycerin and niacinamide to hydrate and calm the skin.

Bioderma

Atoderm Cleansing Oil For Very Dry To Eczema-Prone Skin 1L

£11.60

If you’re familiar with the concept of oil cleansing for your face, you will love oil cleansing for the body. Oil cleansing helps to remove dirt and debris from the pores without stripping the skin of any natural moisturising factors (NMFs) or damaging the skin barrier in any way. Shower oils can also be used as a lubricant when shaving if you have dry skin. The Bioderma Atoderm Cleansing Oil for Very Dry To Eczema-Prone Skin, is lightly fragranced and provides a gentle yet satisfying lather. It is designed with niacinamide, glycerin and plant biolipids to restore the skin barrier and prevent further damage to already dry skin.

Eucerin Urea

Repair Plus 5% Urea Replenishing Body Wash 400ml

£12.00

Eucerin are the masters of dealing with dry skin by using their star ingredient ‘urea’ which helps to moisturise the skin and gently exfoliate away any flakes that may be associated with skin dryness. Urea can be found in their ‘UreaRepair Plus 5% Urea Replenishing Body Wash’. This Body wash is fragrance free, which allows you to have a clean base to layer your signature scents or to use the Replenishing Body Wash if you have very sensitive skin. If you suffer from keratosis pilaris (KP) or very dry skin, this is the wash for you.

Naturium

The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Hydrating Body Wash

£18.00

The Naturium ‘The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Hydrating Body Wash’ is a great entry level dry-skin body cleanser, that does not force you to compromise on scent for the sake of your skin barrier. Naturium uses a blend of aromatic oils to both nourish your skin and envelope your shower in a warm wintery baking scent. Formulated with squalane, rosehip oil and jojoba oil to protect your skin barrier from the winter blues, this is a hot commodity in the skincare space, so stock up whilst you can.

Burga

Ride The Wave Macbook Case

£34.95

Look at the top of your MacBook. How scratched up is it? If not at all or barely – congrats! You still have time to preserve it before the inevitable happens. If it’s beyond a simple wipe with a micro-fiber cloth, it’s time for some damage control.

Alohas

White knit bodycon dress

£93.00

Designed for a close, figure-hugging fit, our Delicate dress delivers sophisticated comfort with its fresh white hue and soft knit feel. It has a demure high neckline framed by thin spaghetti straps, but surprisingly turns to reveal a sexy open back with adjustable ties.

Wear with chunky gold jewellery and our Bellini sandals to someplace fabulous! Please note that this style is semi-sheer, so if you’re not quite prepared to bare all underneath, we recommend a slip.

Galvan

Mayfair halterneck asymmetric satin gown

£1,495.00

Galvan’s elegant ‘Mayfair’ gown channels Old Hollywood glamour – perfect if you’re looking for something timeless and classic for your big day. Cut on the bias from satin, it has a halterneck and sash straps that drape dramatically down the back. Thanks to the slightly flared skirt, you’ll be able to dance the night away at the reception (as long as you pick a pair of comfy heels).

Rituals

Perfume Genie

£114.90

Home isn’t a place, it’s a feeling: create it with the Perfume Genie 2.0. A modern and innovative approach to home fragrance, the Genie provides a unique fragrance experience and allows you to control the schedule and fragrance intensity remotely. The eye-catching, stylish design adds a sophisticated touch to your interior, while also welcoming you home with your favourite Rituals fragrance. Perfect for use in any part of your home, especially in larger spaces.

Marshall Acton

Home Speaker – Cream

£259.99

As the most compact speaker in the home line-up, Acton III fits in anywhere, with sound that really stands out. Acton III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, delivering room-filling Marshall signature sound that has been re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation of Acton has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room.

Keter

Borneo Graphite Rattan effect garden storage

£120.00

An ideal outdoor addition to any garden for those who like their storage solutions both elegant and practical. The Borneo storage box is built out of a low maintenance durable Resin to keep items such as patio accessories and chair cushions dry and ventilated as well as provide full weather resistance.

It’s also designed with an elegant wood with wicker/rattan appearance that has a capacity of 416L. The Borneo storage box also comfortably seats two adults, which adds an extra seating option when entering and has a lockable feature with, an automatic opening mechanism for ease.

Keter

Store it out Midi Bin 880L

£130.00

The Store It Out MIDI is an ideal storage solution for garden equipment. With its stylish wood-look design, 880L capacity and durable, weather-resistant construction, it is built to last. It includes built-in ventilation, a sloped floor to protect contents against mud and rainwater and a built-in support for you to add your own shelf. Convenient opening from the top or front and a step-on lock makes access easy when you need it. It can hold 2 x 120L bins.

Sophie Conran

Large Salad bowl

£46.36

Bring some fresh goodness to the table with this small salad bowl. Part of the Sophie Conran collection, it’s crafted from pure white porcelain and features the signature ripple, making it an instant favourite amongst your lunch serving display.

Drawning on decades of experience to create a durable design for busy kitchens and lively dinner parties, this bowl ideal for serving around a bustling table or carrying out into the garden for a family barbecue on a warm summer evening.

Wolf & Badger

Zen Long Pyjama Set – Sage

£114.00

In a world that never stops, find your Zen in our classic Long PJ’s. More than sleepwear, Let Bamboo Lyocell sateen envelop you in a cocoon of tranquillity, its touch as soft as silk, its embrace as gentle as a night breeze.

With OEKO-TEX certification, we offer you not just a product, but a promise—a commitment to sustainability & ethical manufacture.

SLEEPER

+ NET SUSTAIN feather-trimmed crepe de chine pajama set

£340.00

Sleeper’s nightwear-turned-partywear is made locally to the brand in Kyiv, Ukraine. Cut from lightweight crepe de chine, this vintage-inspired pajama set features a pink shirt with tonal piping and mother-of-pearl buttons.

The cropped pants have an elasticated waist and the brand’s signature feathers at the hem, which can be detached when you want to keep things simple. Take inspiration from the label’s Instagram and wear yours with strappy sandals and a structured mini bag.

M&S COLLECTION

Duck Feather & Down 10.5 Tog Duvet

£49.50

Ensure you stay snug and warm all night long with our breathable 10.5 tog duvet that’s perfect for keeping you comfy during the spring and autumn months. Made with incredibly soft duck feather and down for a naturally insulating filling, our duvet also features a pure cotton 233 thread count cover for a truly comfortable bedding option.

Our duvet can also be machine washed at 40°C to ensure you never have to go without a fresh feeling duvet again.

Belkin

MagSafe 15W Wireless Charger Pad and Stand

£49.99

The Belkin BoostCharge Pro Portable Wireless Charger Pad with MagSafe Special Edition was engineered with official MagSafe technology to deliver fast wireless charging for the iPhone 15, iPhone 14, iPhone 13 and iPhone 12 series. It also allows you to keep using your iPhone while it charges, thanks to a thoughtfully designed pop-up stand and an extra-long cable. The magnetic attachment ensures perfect, Snap-On alignment every time, while the slim, lightweight design makes it perfect for travel.

Silentnight

Silent night Comfort Control Electric Underblanket – Double

£45.00

Ideal for compromising couples, the Silentnight Yours & Mine Dual Control Electric Blanket helps to keep both of you cosy and warm over the colder months and can be controlled from each side of the bed. The 3 heat settings allow you to choose a temperature that is just right for you. The Electric Blanket is an energy efficient and affordable way to stay warm for less. Pre- heating your bed for 1 hour on a low heat setting costs as little as 1p, so you can afford to cosy up night after night.

SOS Serum Skincare

SOS SPF 50 Sun Cream

£38.00

When looking at this sunscreen, you may feel as though you have struck gold and found the ultimate mineral sunscreen with no white cast at all!

But this is not the case. SOS Serum have been a bit cheeky with their labelling and forgotten to include the fact that this formula contains four chemical sunscreen filters, making it a hybrid sunscreen. Mislabelling aside, this is one of the smoothest sunscreen formulas I have ever encountered.

Bea Skincare

Solar Defence SPF50

£30.00

Long rumoured to be the only sunscreen with zinc oxide and titanium dioxide available, aesthetician owned brand Bea Skincare, seems to have flown under the radar to create an award winning mineral sunscreen with little to no white cast. The one caveat to include when looking at this formula, is that online the ingredient list available is not written in a scientific manner and would require you to request the correct ingredients list.

Shida Preserved Flowers

Dried artichoke – 2 stems

£12.00

A beautiful, exotic dried flower, the artichoke flower lasts forever and this pair add a pop of colour to your room. Group several together in a vase for a dramatic display. The flowers have been dried to retain their natural colour and each one is unique. Flower heads are 6-10cm in diameter. The stems of these flowers are short, lengths vary from 6cm to 12cm.

Najell Rise

Almond Beige Baby Carrier

£145.00

The Najell Rise takes baby wearing to the next level. With minimal settings yet maximum comfort, it’s never been easier to get your baby into the perfect position every time. Whether they are facing you, front facing, or on your back, you can effortlessly switch positions and carriers with no complicated setting changes. And the magnetic fastening buckles allows you to safely buckle your baby using only one hand.

ARTIPOPPE

Zeitgeist Baby Carrier Argus Azure Anthracite

£477.00

For parents with an eye for modern design, turn to Artipoppe’s Zeitgeist Baby Carrier to cocoon your baby close to your body. Thanks to its four adjustable sizing positions, this everyday essential will fit them happily throughout their first two years of exploring, while supported leg openings, shoulder pads and an adjustable neck cushion will keep you both comfortable throughout early wanderings together.

Tom Dixon

Alchemy reed diffuser

£100.00

Tom Dixon says “often the most potent first impression and subsequent memory of a space can be its smell”, which is why the British designer created his own home fragrance line.

Inspired by the endless search to transform basic materials into valuable substance, this ‘Alchemy’ diffuser opens with notes of Gunpowder, Patchouli and sharp Black Pepper before reaching a base of woody Cypress, Suede and smoky Guaiac Wood. Flip the reeds a couple of times a week to maintain the intensity of the aroma.

The Attico

Devon satin mules

£560.00

A Fun Square Toe: Your shoes have a character, and a jazzy, fun square-toe heel is the life of the party. Switch things up from time to time and get playful with a heel you will bring out when you want to have fun. What is also great about a square toe is it provides some variety in your wardrobe, meaning your heels will likely last a lifetime.

Rhode

Peptide Lip Treatment

£16.00

The lips are often so neglected, but are the most active parts of our faces. Nothing has gone as viral as the peptide lip treatment! If you ask any beauty lover there is at least one in their bag. The glow is truly like no other, and the lip treatment leaves your lips feeling plush even after you wipe it off. There are five different options on flavours, with all of them being sweet in different ways. To get the most out of your peptide lip treatment, I recommend slightly dampening your lips so they humectants in the lip treatment can lock in even more hydration.

Rhode

Barrier Restore Cream

£29.00

The skin barrier has been a staple in skincare content creation for more than one year now, and for good reason. We spent far too many years completely neglecting our skin barrier by scrubbing it away or messing around with DIY skincare (yes this includes baking soda and lemon). But what makes the Rhode barrier restore cream different to any other moisturiser on the market? The texture! Texture seems to be such a key focus at Rhode, with this moisturising hailing a very lightweight feel but providing deep moisture. BRC is formulated with peptides, niacinamide, shea butter and bisabolol.

Rhode

Glazing Milk

£29.00

Well let’s talk about the most viral hydrating, toner and essence hybrid of the moment! From aesthetician’s to skincare enthusiasts everyone seems to have fallen in love with Rhode’s Glazing Milk. This toner essence hybrid contains a blend of ceramides, magnesium, copper salts, as well as emollient beta-glucan to soothe, calm and hydrate your skin all in one. I think the reason everyone has fallen in love with the glazing milk is due to the texture, it is unusually thick for a hydrating essence-type product but this thickness does not make it uncomfortable or heavy when applied.

One Size

Beauty Ultimate Blurring Setting Powder

£17.00

Loose powders will forever have my heart! And when I realised that I had made the unfortunate mistake of not packing my powder, during my last trip to the the US, I ran to a Sephora to ask for a recommendation. I was recommended the Ultimate Blurring Setting Powder from One Size Beauty and I’ve never put it down since! This is a long lasting powder, that will stick beside you until you physically remove it. As there are only two shades within this range, I recommend getting both and customising a shade to best suit your needs.

Charlotte Tilbury

Airbrush Flawless Finish

£38.00

From the Charlotte Tilbury Labs, we have this absolute beauty! If you look at all of Charlotte Tilbury’s clients, you can see that they all really do have this airbrushed glow and I believe that is all down to the magical powers pressed into this powder! Airbrush Flawless Finish boasts four shades, suitable for all skin tones and skin types. I find that this powder works best when applied with a beauty sponge or powder puff. Again, absolutely no flashback!

Fenty Beauty

Invisimatte Instant Setting + Blotting Powder

£25.00

I discovered this as a happy accident actually, I remember just throwing the invisimatte into my bag and thinking nothing of it. But when it came down to crunch time and I was extremely shiny, I found that invisimatte mopped that up in an instant. Following my discovery, I decided to try a full face with the powder and wash pleasantly surprised. Unfortunately invisimatte is only available in one universal pinkish shade, which means there will be no brightening or colour correcting to be seen.

Huda Beauty

Easy Bake Loose Baking & Setting Powder

£34.00

If Easy Bake has one fan it’s me! This powder is finely milled and comes in a plethora of shades to suit your skin tone. With the recent addition of the shade Cherry Blossom, I never complete a look without it! Even in the slightly lighter shades available I never have to worry about flashback. Easy bake also absorbs oily quite well without curdling together.

Augustinus Bader

The Rich Cream

£71.00

The thickness of this cream is what makes it perfect for the winter months and not only is she a thick Hun, her hydrating properties are insane and will have you waking up with renewed skin! The AB rich cream has been a favourite of mine for many years but you may be wondering why I’m telling you to buy such an expensive cream. Well if you didn’t know, AB has a patented formula called TFC8 which basically unlocks your body’s ability to rejuvenate your skin cells – very sciency Hun. This complex counteracts aging hence leaving you with plump and youthful skin! If you’re wanting to try it out, opt for the mini version to save some coins.

Elizabeth Arden

Exclusive Hyaluronic Acid Ceramide Capsules Hydra-Plumping Serum

£39.20

To know me is to know these capsules. I have tried many-a hyaluronic acid serums; Dr Barbra strum, the ordinary you name it but not a single one on the market has out-performed this one! It’s so gentle yet hydrating and works in perfect synergy with any skincare product you pair it with! You’ll see best results when you apply it whilst your skin is damp (after washing and toning).

Tatcha

The Dewy Skin Cream

£67.00

The best word to use to describe this cream is refreshing. The Tatcha dewy skin cream is thick but in a breathable way, and will really inject a lot of moisture into your skin. It will literally plump and brighten your skin overnight and if you’re still not sure about my personal claims, grab the mini version to convince before you take the plunge and buy the big jar. Trust me, you’ll buy the big jar!

Ren Clean Skincare

Evercalm Overnight Recovery Balm 15ml

£20.00

This product is an OG in my beauty routine and it’s so multifaceted, it’s definitely worth being in yours. It’s perfect for when you’re experience super dry irritated skin, you know the kind you get around you nose during a nasty cold. It completely calms it down as well as hydrates and repairs irritated skin. It’s definitely one for the colder months! Apply it all over until you look like a little shiny bauble. That’s when you’ll see it’s best effects.

Rhode Lip

Peptide Lip Treatment

£16.00

You know I’ll back this product until the end. As a self professed lip balm treatment babe. I’m here to tell you that this is the absolute best lip treatment on the market. Better than Laniege, La Roche Posay, Carmex Vaseline and whatever. This product will completely outperform your fave. Applying it at night-time is almost like a cheat code. It works so so well and plumps your lips so much, you’re likely not the see a single line or crack in them in the morning! Trust me!

Sarah Chapma

Skinesis Overnight Facial

£62.00

They meant what they said when they called this product an overnight facial. It completely smooths your skin out whilst calming it with spa like properties. Think of the swankiest spa you know. What does it smell like? Well they’ve bottled that up and put it in here! One thing I love bout this product is that it’s non irritating meaning most if not all skin types can use it! I’m left with the most plump and hydrated skin the next day without fail so this is an investment worth making. It’s a great replacement for you typical facial oil. Use it after you tone and moisturise to lock all the moisture in.

Cuticle oil

Nails Inc Superfood Repair Oil

£15.00

The amazingly scented Nails Inc Superfood Repair Oil contains a perfect blend of moisturising superfood oils.

Each oil has been specifically added to the blend to offer real nail and cuticle caring benefits to ensure the health of the nail and cuticle is well maintained.

The oil is enriched with moisturising Sweet Almond and Argan Oils, plus Rose Hip Oil for its strong regenerating antioxidant benefits and high levels of Vitamin A.

Bed Kings

Goose Feather & Down Mattress Topper

£330.00

For the Huns who like them thick;

This mattress topper from Bed King’s looks tempting to say the least. Whilst researching for this article I came across it and I may just be buying one to test out at home! You have the options for a standard fill or high fill if you like it plush. If I were to get one, id get it filled to the brim.

John Lewis

Classic Collection 5cm Deep Comfort Layer Mattress Topper

£275.00

To me, this is the G.O.A.T of all mattress toppers. It’s luxurious, plush and feels like you’re sleeping on a massive pillow. This is the one I have on all the beds in my house and everyone always gushes about it when they stay round.

Kilner

All In One Food To Go Jar Set

£18.50

The Kilner All In 1 Food To Go Set is an innovative way to store, carry and consume cold and hot foods directly from the jar, the uniquely designed jar is ideal for making and storing homemade healthy snacks and lunches on the go, the silicone garnish pot allows you to separate sauces, dressings, or dips from the dry ingredients keeping your food crisp and fresh, whilst Its innovative silicone stopper creates a funnel for pouring hot water directly onto noodles

Curlsmith

Curl Cleansing Conditioning Wash

£22.00

The Curl Quenching Conditioning Wash is designed to gently and effectively cleanse curly hair, removing product build up and impurities without stripping the hair of its natural moisture.

The Co-wash conditions the hair while cleansing, leaving the hair feeling soft, moisturised and easy to detangle. Gentle enough for everyday use, the wash does not lather, helping to protect the hair’s natural moisture barrier. The co-wash is enriched with Resurrection Flower extract, a Rare plant that locks moisture into the hair, while superfood Andiroba promotes hair health and supports growth.

Malin + Goetz

Peppermint Shampoo

£21.00

If you’re morning shower is as much a wake-up call as it is a scrub-a-dub-dub, MALIN + GOETZ’ Peppermint Shampoo is definitely for you. With a reviving peppermint scent, it’s blended with natural peppermint extract to give your hair (and your energy levels) and fresh zing without being overpowering. The gentle formula is cleverly infused with amino acid-based cleansing agents which remove dirt, excess oil and product build-up without stripping or drying the hair or scalp. Instead, it leaves your locks soft and sleek – what’s not to love?

Veronica Beard

Finca Mixed-Media Dress

£328.00

Made for summer nights. A combination of two different cottons—a ribbed tank with a touch of stretch up top; a crisp poplin skirt on bottom— the Finca mixed-media dress gives the illusion of two pieces in one. Perfect for day-to-night dressing, this fresh and chic style also features our signature ruching down the side of its asymmetrical midi skirt, creating that figure-flattering finish we’re known for. Reach for the Finca on days you want to look elevated without any effort; just add your favourite sandals and go.

Sage

The Barista Express Impress

£729.95

Create third wave speciality coffee at home from bean to espresso in less than a minute. The best of the Barista Express with the Impress™ Puck System. Helping you to achieve the perfect dose and a precise tamp while reducing the grinds on the machine and bench top.

Abel & Cole

Sencha green tea

£3.50

Make your next cup of tea a Japanese-inspired experience, with Clearspring’s organic Sencha tea bags. Grown in the hills surrounding Kyoto and Kyushu, where both climate and soil combine to produce lush and tender green leaves. These are rolled and dried right after harvesting to lock in the traditional freshness and aroma that made tea a matter of ceremonial importance in Japan.

Urban Decay

All Nighter Setting Spray

£12.00

Urban Decay’s All Nighter Setting Spray is one of the best on the market – it’s super affordable, long-lasting and comes in a slim mini size for optimised space in your travel bag. This weightless spray keeps your makeup looking gorgeously just-applied for up to 16 hours—without melting, cracking, fading or settling into fine lines. It also features patented Temperature Control Technology to lower the temperature of your makeup to keep foundation, eyeshadow, blush and concealer in place—even in hot and humid or cold and windy conditions.

Colour Wow

Dream Coat Supernatural Spray

£12.50

This viral sensation isn’t sending customers wild for nothing. The Colour Wow Dream Coat Supernatural spray is anti-frizz and waterproof in even the worst of humidity. The advanced, intelligent and ultra lightweight formula has been packed into a travel size bottle, making it the perfect holiday must have for leave-outs, silk presses and bouncy blow-dries. Plus, it lasts for 3-4 shampoos, so less is really more!

Monday Haircare

Moisture Mini Shampoo and Conditioner

£2.00

Monday’s dreamy shampoo and conditioner now comes stuffed into adorable packaging, making packing your travel liquids bag easier than ever. The wonder product is made up of coconut oil, hydrolysed rice protein, shea butter and vitamin E and uses a gentle cleansing system to add moisture as it cleans. For ultra-nourishing results that last, Monday is your girl.

Fenty Beauty

Cheeks Out Freestyle Cream Blush

£16.80

It might only weigh 3g, but Fenty’s mini Cheeks Out cream blush is packed full of pigment and product. Coming in an exciting range of luminous colours, the Cheeks Our blushers are sheer and buildable and melt into skin at the tap of your fingertips—perfect for a holiday glow without the fuss. Plus it’s made up of a light-as-air, sweat- and water-resistant formula that smooths over skin without feeling sticky or greasy.

Fenty Beauty

Mini Eaze Drop’lit All-Over Glow Enhancer

£23.20

The Fenty Beauty Mini All-Over Glow Enhancer is a sheer complexion booster that delivers instant, natural-looking illumination for next-level glow. Not only is this product under 100ml, but it can help mimic your holiday glow as well as softening imperfections and reducing the look of pores. Wear for a flattering no-makeup makeup look or as a base illuminator underneath your chosen skin tint or foundation.

H&M Home

Large pampas

£49.99

This beautiful bunch of large Pampas Grass will add some elegance to your home with its natural tones and texture. Style alone in a vase or add into an existing arrangement of dried flowers to inject extra interest. Please note that our dried flowers and grasses are natural and the size, shape and texture will vary bunch to bunch. Includes 5 stems. Height 95-115cm.

Contempee

Faux Kiku Flower

£29.99

chrysanthemum is the perfect addition to any home. They come in a bunch of 10 stems and are a great way to add colour to your home. The pictures shown are of one bouquet (10 stems), each stem has multiple flower heads.

Dunelm

Elements Sculpted Two Tone Glass Vase

£20.00

The Elements Sculpted Two Tone Vase will add a modern and welcoming touch to your living areas, whether displaying beautiful flowers or sat alone as an ornament, this piece is sure to stand out in your room. Beautifully crafted from glass, the stylish and unique design alongside the two tone colourway will add a timeless look and feel to your home.

The Ordinary

Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG

£7.90

This light-textured formula contains an extremely high 5% concentration of caffeine, supplemented with highly-purified Epigallocatechin Gallatyl Glucoside (EGCG) from green tea leaves. Independent studies have shown that topical use of each of caffeine and EGCG can help reduce looks of puffiness and of dark circles in the eye contour. Additional studies have shown that caffeine can also reduce the appearance of cellulite.

Youth to The People

15% VITAMIN C + CLEAN CAFFEINE ENERGY SERUM

£21.00

Hailing from California, this eco-conscious, philanthropic brand is committed to harnessing nutrient-dense superfoods that have an impact on your skins health and less of one on the environmentrest assured, every formula is cruelty-free and 100% vegan! If youthful eye countours with diminished dark circles and reduced puffiness is your thing, the Youth To The People’s 15% Vitamin C + Clean Caffeine Energy Serum is theeye-dealaddition to your skin care arsenal. This is glowy skin bottled.

Lingadore

Triangle padded bikiniset

£59.95

Nectar… The colour of joy! A vibrant colour that will steal the show this summer. The wavey textured fabric makes this bikini a real eye-catcher! The triangle bikini top is a padded top with an underwire. The bikini closes with a back closure with clip and a tie closure in the neck. The tie-side brief has an adjustable tie closure on the sides.

Aquazzura

Suede Deneuve Ballet Flats

£565.00

The embodiment of understated elegance, these Deneuve flats by Aquazzura boast a minimalist silhouette topped off with a flirtatious bow detail to the back. Expertly crafted by Italian artisans in sumptuous leather, the pair is set upon a low heel with a metallic detail glistening subtly in the sun as you walk down the street on a hot summer’s day.

Jennifer Chamandi

Leather Lorenzo Ballet Flats

£540

Behold, the solution to your footwear quest: ballet flats that suit all of your Autumn/Winter occasions. Created by Jennifer Chamandi – who immersed herself in weekend classes at London’s Cordwainers College before learning Italian so she could truly immerse herself in the country’s craft – knows a thing or two about European style. True to the brand’s DNA, they come with a signature ‘eye of the needle’ detail in each heel, allowing you to decide whether or not you feel like wearing the accompanied buckle strap.

Medela

Freestyle hands breast pump

£300.00

Still giving you flexibility to move around, this pump recharges too. Due to the clip on pack it might not be as easy to leave the house with it, but you definitely won’t be stuck to just the sofa at home.

Sous Chef

Mepal Cirqula Round 3 Piece Set, Nordic Sage

£27.99

The Mepal Cirqula 3-piece set in Nordic sage is a practical and beautiful kitchen storage system. It includes 350ml, 750ml and 1250ml bowls, so you can store anything from full meals to smaller salads and snacks. Each bowl has a transparent window in the lid so the contents remain visible and you can easily grab what you need. Use them to store homemade soups, cooked pasta and chopped vegetables to make midweek cooking quicker and easier.

Agolde

Heller denim vest

£280.00

Pulled straight from the early aughts, waist coats have taken on a life of their own lately – everyone from celebrities to influencers currently has at least one in their rotation. AGOLDE’s slim-fitting ‘Heller’ vest is made from black denim that’s gently faded along the curved seams. Wear yours with jeans, midi skirts or tailoring.

Marks & Spencers

Set of 4 champagne saucers

£29.50

Designed to be uniquely stylish and give a uniquely fabulous way to enjoy champagne, prosecco and sparkling cocktails, these champagne saucers bring a touch of vintage style to any dinner table or special occasion. Featuring tiny indentations in the glass, these vintage champagne glasses keep bubbles sparkling for longer. In a pack of four, these crystal glasses are sure to bring elegance to your next dinner party, and are completely dishwasher safe for easy washing.

Jacquemus

Convertible asymmetric cutout frayed crepe midi dress

£587.50

Jacquemus’ midi dress is designed with various customizable elements, like detachable sleeves and a zip that allows you to create a bold slit along the skirt. Made from cotton-fused crepe, it has a cutout bodice and falls to a frayed, asymmetric hem. Style yours with the brand’s strappy heels and a boxy bag.

COS

Knitted bandeau maxi dress

£110.00

This dress is all about subtle contrast; the bodice is crafted with a textured ripple stitch, while the sheer skirt is made from alternating bands of plain and tubular knits, so it looks as though it’s pleated. Knitted from a cotton blend in a bold apple-green hue, it has a modern bandeau neckline and a fitted bodice that flares out from the waist to a voluminous skirt.

Booby Tape

Nood Shape Tape

£29

Breast tape that provides lift, shape & support wherever you need it. 3in and 4in wide design options means easier application and 33% more wear than your normal breast tape. A fresh take on a wardrobe staple, made of sustainable hemp fabric that can accommodate tatas of all sizes & keeps your girls in place no matter the outfit!

Bello Home

Natha Mirror

£730.00

The mirror is a full-length wavy edge mirror, ideal for effortlessly lean or hanging with precision in any contemporary aesthetic living space. This unique design oozes modern style with a look that’s paired back enough to create a classic industrial living feel. Choose from a generously sized standing design or a delicate hanging alternative for the finishing touch that will open up your space.

Trudon

Ernesto Scented Candle

£85

Cire Trudon’s Ernesto soya wax candle was named after the revolutionary politician Che Guevara and evokes the warm spicy aromas of 1950s Havana; aromatic top notes of bergamot and rum are followed by labdanum and patchouli, and rounded off by a deep leather and tobacco base. It’s encased in a handcrafted green glass vessel and decorated with a logo-embossed gold front plaque – perfect for your mantelpiece.

MOVE DANCE

Bloch European Balance Pointe Shoe

£57.50

The Balance European allows every dancer to feel as though they can stand en pointe all day, as the curved last and shank remain in close contact with the instep, significantly improving injury protection. This beautiful pointe shoe has a curved last which follows the natural contours of the foot. Contributing to the comfort is the tapered box with less internal space for the toes to create a snug and secure fit. The pointe shoe is designed with a diagonal side stream to reduce the satin from creasing.

ADANOLA

Ultimate Leggings – Cocoa Brown

£39.99

The Ultimate Leggings are designed using a light, four-way stretch fabric. These leggings are designed without a front seam, meaning no camel toe, as well as a higher waistline for extra support and to contour the body. Perfect for doing everything, every day. Style with a trench coat for a seasonal, casual look.
